text: Arie and Lauren, the happy couple. ( Paul Hebert / ABC ) It has not been a great week for Arie Luyendyk Jr. The 36 - year - old race - car - driver - turned - real - estate - agent faced immense backlash after his turn as ABC ’ s “ The Bachelor ” when he proposed to Becca Kufrin, a 27 - year - old publicist from Minnesota, and then blindsided her with a breakup so he could propose to the runner - up, Lauren Burnham, a 25 - year - old salesperson from Virginia. So, as is tradition, the final “ Bachelor ” couple has to embark on ABC talk show appearances after the finale — and for Arie, it has naturally turned pretty defensive.
